name: 5MinuteStorytelling-ActivitiesforSeniors
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Make the most of the 5 minutes you have with the person in front of you through intentional storytelling. These exercises have also been referred to as Medicine Minutes. The idea being that you have 2-5 minutes with a patient or resident and you can use these scripts to start a storytelling conversation instead of chatting about how crappy they feel and the weather.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
